author: Paul Hollywood
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Put all the ingredients in a bowl except the dates and figs, gently bring the mixture together until you have a soft dough-like texture. Add the dates and figs and roll the dough out using a rolling pin to about 4cm/1Â½" deep. Cut out scone shapes with a round cutter and place them on a baking sheet. Brush with egg wash and bake for 20 minutes until golden brown.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz strong flour,  85g/3oz sugar,  30g/1oz baking powder,  85g/3oz butter,  2 eggs,  225ml/8fl oz milk,  55g/2oz dates,  55g/2oz figs
